Package alpha.other

Class Ability

java.lang.Object
alpha.other.Ability
public class Ability extends Object
All "Entities" (Enemies, playable characters, and other living things that fight all have abilities. The "Ability" class helps by taking care of the damage, naming, and determining if is an AOE attack.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Ability()
    Default constructor will make an ability with no real name, a base damage of 10, and not being AOE(Area of Effect).
    Ability(String name, int damage, boolean isAOE)
    A constructor that allows to choose all the stats beforehand.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ability

      public Ability()
      Default constructor will make an ability with no real name, a base damage of 10, and not being AOE(Area of Effect). These can be changed after if wanted to.

    • Ability

      public Ability(String name, int damage, boolean isAOE)
      A constructor that allows to choose all the stats beforehand.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ability
      damage - The damage of the ability, should be relativly low as it will scale with the players damage/power.
      isAOE - Used with a different function to deterime if a ability is AOE (Area of Effect).

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      The abilities name

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the ability

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage()
      Returns:
      The abilities damage

    • setDamage

      public void setDamage(int damage)
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage the abilty will now do

    • isAOE

      public boolean isAOE()
      Returns:
      Whether or not the ability is an AOE spell

    • setAOE

      public void setAOE(boolean isAOE)
      Parameters:
      isAOE - Decides if the spell is AOE or not

    • displayAbilities

      public static void displayAbilities(Ability[] abilities)
      Used in combination with the toString() method to properly display a group of spells. Most, if not all Entities will have more than one ability, so it is needed.
      Parameters:
      abilities - The set of abilities a Entity will have.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Prints an ability's name, damage, and whether it is AOE or not.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
